蓮宗.definition: see 淨土宗|净土宗[Jing4 tu3 zong1]

蓮步.definition: (literary) light, airy steps (as if walking on lotuses); elegant gait of a woman

蓮池區.definition: Lianchi District of Baoding 保定[Bao3 ding4], Hebei

蓮湖.definition: Lianhu District of Xi’an 西安市[Xi1 an1 Shi4], Shaanxi

蓮湖區.definition: Lianhu District of Xi’an 西安市[Xi1 an1 Shi4], Shaanxi

蓮花.definition: lotus flower (Nelumbo nucifera Gaertn, among others); water-lily

蓮花縣.definition: Lianhua county in Pingxiang 萍鄉|萍乡, Jiangxi

蓮花落.definition: genre of folk song with accompaniment of bamboo clappers

蓮都.definition: Liandu district of Lishui city 麗水市|丽水市[Li2 shui3 shi4], Zhejiang

蓮都區.definition: Liandu district of Lishui city 麗水市|丽水市[Li2 shui3 shi4], Zhejiang
